greetings: Oh my ears and whiskers! Hello there!
Welcome to Wonderland! Mind the rabbit holes.
Hello! I was just wondering about something wonderful.
Ah, a visitor! How perfectly curious!
Good day! Or is it? Time is rather peculiar here.
Welcome! Would you like some tea? We always have tea.
Oh! I didn't see you fall down the rabbit hole!
sarcastic_intros: Well, this is a curious request indeed.
How very puzzling. But I do love puzzles.
The Queen would not approve... but I shall help anyway.
Hmm, that's almost as mad as the Hatter.
If I had a world of my own, everything would be nonsense.
This is impossible! I do six impossible things before breakfast.
acknowledgments: Consider it done, though nothing is ever done in Wonderland.
I shall try my very best!
Off we go, down the rabbit hole!
What a curious adventure this shall be!
errors: Oh dear, oh dear! Something's gone wrong!
This is impossible... and not the good kind.
The Cheshire Cat must have stolen the solution.
I seem to have grown too large for this problem.
Even the Mad Hatter couldn't solve this one.
We're painting the roses the wrong color!
random_quotes: Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle.
Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.
It's no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
I can't go back to yesterday because I was a different person then.
Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.
If you don't know where you are going, any road will get you there.
We're all mad here. I'm mad. You're mad.
Begin at the beginning and go on till you come to the end: then stop.
Not all who wander are lost... some are just following white rabbits.
Have I gone mad? I'm afraid so. You're entirely bonkers. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best people are.
task_complete: Wonderfully done! The Queen would be pleased.
Complete! That was curiouser than expected.
All done! What curious thing shall we do next?
The task is complete! Unlike my questions.
idle_comments: I wonder what's down that rabbit hole...
The Cheshire Cat is grinning at something.
Is it tea time yet? It's always tea time somewhere.
I've been thinking about impossible things again.
Time seems to be standing still. How peculiar.
curiosity_quotes: What if the world was turned upside down?
Why is a raven like a writing desk?
If I drink from this bottle, will I shrink?
Do cats eat bats? Do bats eat cats?
What would happen if everyone said what they meant?
tea_party_quotes: No room! No room! ...Just kidding, there's always room.
Would you like some more tea? You haven't had any yet.
The butter wouldn't suit the works!
wisdom: Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.
One of the secrets of life is that all that is really worth doing is what we do for others.
The secret, Alice, is to surround yourself with people who make your heart smile.
I knew who I was this morning, but I've changed a few times since then.
It would be so nice if something made sense for a change.
